TopicTitle: Can you get on the Seats in Space?

Articles.Content: I have been trying to build some thing like M.O.O.S.E for a while now, but I can't seem to get the Kerbal to sit on the seat. So I was wondering if you can use the seats while in space/orbit.
*facepalm* I knew I was doing something wrong! Thank you for telling me how to use them.
